mapper.update: update tbl_corona set count = #{count} where areacode = #{localName}
mapper.select: select c1.areacode, c2.local_name, c1.count from (select rownum, areacode, count from (select avg(count) as count, areaCode from (select * from TBL_corona where TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYYMMDD') > sysdate - 7) group by areacode order by count) where rownum <= #{size}) c1 inner join tbl_corona c2 on c1.areaCode = c2.areaCode where c2.regdate > sysdate - 1 order by c1.count
